sentences.en: "Make the punishment fit the crime." How neat and tidy it sounded.
sentences.cn: “罪罚相当”，这听起来多么简洁。

sentences.en: "Oh, those new apartments are really neat," the girl babbled on.
sentences.cn: 那个女孩赞不绝口地说：“噢，那些新公寓真是非常棒。”

sentences.en: Everything in the house was neat and tidy.
sentences.cn: 房子里的每样物品都干净整齐。

sentences.en: He poured himself a brandy and swallowed it neat.
sentences.cn: 他给自己倒了一杯白兰地，没兑水就一饮而尽。

sentences.en: He was praised for his neat and careful work.
sentences.cn: 他因工作认真、利索而受到赞扬.

sentences.en: His clothes were always neat and clean.
sentences.cn: 他的衣服总是很整洁。

sentences.en: John is compulsively neat and clean, he's terrified of germs.
sentences.cn: 约翰有洁癖，非常害怕细菌。

sentences.en: neat handwriting
sentences.cn: 工整的笔迹

sentences.en: neat rows of books
sentences.cn: 一排排整齐的书

sentences.en: Neat solutions are not easily found to these issues.
sentences.cn: 很难找到解决这些问题的巧妙办法。

sentences.en: Several men are pushing school desks and chairs into neat rows.
sentences.cn: 几个人正挪动学校的桌椅，将它们排整齐。

sentences.en: She arranged the books in a nice neat pile.
sentences.cn: 她把书摞成整齐的一堆。

sentences.en: Square up the books to make them look neat.
sentences.cn: 把书摆正,使其整齐美观.

sentences.en: That’s a really neat idea.
sentences.cn: 那个主意真不错。

sentences.en: The children cooperated with their teachers in keeping the classroom neat.
sentences.cn: 孩子们和老师一起保持教室整洁.

sentences.en: The clothes were folded in a neat pile.
sentences.cn: 衣服叠放成整齐的一摞。

sentences.en: The furniture was stiff, uncomfortable, too delicate, and too neat.
sentences.cn: 家具又硬又不舒服，太不结实而且太小巧。

sentences.en: The neighbours' gardens were trim and neat.
sentences.cn: 邻居们的花园整洁美观。

sentences.en: The rest of the room was neat and impersonal.
sentences.cn: 房间的其余部分整洁干净，不带任何的个人色彩。

sentences.en: There were neat piles of kindling wood against the wall.
sentences.cn: 墙边整齐地放着几堆引火柴.

words.tran_cn: 灵巧的；整洁的；优雅的；齐整的；未搀水的；平滑的

trans.tran_cn: 整洁的，爱整洁的，小巧优雅的，灵巧的，干净利落的，很好的，未掺水的
